title: EXPENDITURE REPORTS CONCERNING OFFICIAL FOREIGN TRAVEL

content.text:
Reports concerning the foreign currencies and U.S. dollars utilized 
for Official Foreign Travel during the third quarter of 2017, pursuant 
to Public Law 95-384, are as follows:
content.speaker: Unknown

HON. SUSAN W. BROOKS, Chairman, Oct. 3,
